A

Account - Class in model
This class will keep the information of a Jukebox account Created by Alexis Tinoco Modified: David Wang
Account(String, String) - Constructor for class Account
Constructor of the class, sets up the account's name and the password
addAccount(String, String) - Method in class JukeboxAccountCollection
This method adds an account to the collection.
addATimePlayed() - Method in class Song
 
addFirst(String) - Method in class MyList
Adds the element as the first element of the list.
addNext(Song) - Method in class PlayAnMP3
This method is used to add a song to the queue.
addToQueue(String, Account, boolean) - Method in class SongSelector
This method will only add to Queue if the user is allowed to add the given song to queue And if the song has not been played 3 times today
admin(Account) - Method in class JukeboxAccountCollection
Check if a username is an administrator
